response.summary:
Mechatronic Engineer focusing on mobile development, with a spirit of research and creativity, which allow me to learn effectively, as well as plan, organize, program and direct projects, focused on results and teamwork. Graduated from the National University of Colombia and with academic exchange studies at the École des mines des Nantes, France.

Mobile developer for Android and IOS with the use of Flutter sdk. Furthermore i am a developer of native Android applications with features, such as authentication, payments, Firebase, clean architecture, third-party SDK`s, dependencies and REST. With experience in languages like Dart, Java, Kotlin, Python and C.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, English, Team Leadership, Engineering, Android, Flutter, Java, Python, SCRUM, Metodologías ágiles, Dart, Francés, Servicios web de RESTful, Firebase, Git, GitHub, Retrofit, Bases de datos

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
·         Development and maintenance of a digital banking app, using clean code and unit testing.
·         Review the other developers' PRs, to keep the code clean and aligned with the good practices.
·         Participate in technical discussions about the platform, architecture, bugs resolution, sprint planning, refinements, UI design, etc.
·         Give feedback to other developers and help them with their carrier paths.
profile_positions.title: Android Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Development and maintenance of a banking app of + 100K downloads.

- Development of customized mobile applications for major companies in the catering sector in Latin America (Android + IOS).

- Implementation of systems in order to guarantee payment security, such as biometrics, 3DS authentication and end-to-end encryption.
profile_positions.title: Mobile Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Development of a centralized web administration tool for the largest supermarket group in Colombia.

- Full-stack development of the application in Python
profile_positions.title: Desarrollador Junior

profile_positions.description:
- Development of low level control of an AGV (autonomous guided vehicle) + UI by means of an Android application.

- Development of an application of Augmented Reality (AR) in Android to avoid collisions between robotic arms and their operators.
profile_positions.title: Empleado en prácticas

education.degree_name: Ontario College Graduate Certificate - Web Development

company.name: Quqo
company.description: Quqo is a tech-enabled B2B platform that is digitizing the traditional retail supply chain in Southeast Asia's emerging market by offering mom-&-pop stores, distributors and FMCG brands an optimized digital retail experience from traditional sales channels.
